title: Predicting the spatio-temporal distribution of the invasive alien ...
summary: This article analyzes the long-distance dispersal capacities of an invasive alien species by comparing modeling results with field survey data to predict its spatio-temporal distribution under climate change scenarios.
usefulness_reason: Score 75 assigned because the article focuses on "spatio-temporal distribution" and explicitly compares modeling results with "field survey data", making it relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Survey data".
